info.name: Real Estate Backend - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for all roles in the Real Estate Management System

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication APIs for login and token validation

header.description: Token received from login endpoint

item.name: Tenant
item.description: APIs for tenant role - payments and maintenance requests

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns only payments for the logged-in tenant from their company

request.description: Get all payments for the logged-in tenant. Payments are automatically filtered by tenant name (from token) and company. Returns payments ordered by ID descending (newest first).

response.name: Success
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 105,
    "tenant": "John Doe",
    "property": "Apartment 4B, 123 Main St",
    "amount": 1500.0,
    "method": "bank_transfer",
    "chargeType": "rent",
    "date": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "status": "Pending",
    "receiptNumber": "RCP-20240115100000",
    "receiptURL": null,
    "documentURL": null,
    "company": "Company Name",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
  },
  {
    "id": 104,
    "tenant": "John Doe",
    "property": "Apartment 4B, 123 Main St",
    "amount": 1500.0,
    "method": "credit_card",
    "chargeType": "rent",
    "date": "2023-12-01T12:00:00Z",
    "status": "Approved",
    "receiptNumber": "RCP-20231201120000",
    "receiptURL": null,
    "documentURL": null,
    "company": "Company Name",
    "createdAt": "2023-12-01T12:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-12-01T12:00:00Z"
  }
]

body.raw:
{
  "property": "Apartment 4B, 123 Main St",
  "title": "Leaky Faucet",
  "description": "The kitchen faucet has been dripping for 3 days",
  "priority": "medium",
  "tenant": "Current Tenant"
}

item.name: Agency Director
item.description: APIs for agency director role - manages users, properties, financials, works, and reminders within their own company/agency only. All data is automatically filtered by company.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - automatically filters by Agency Director's company
Token received from login endpoint - returns only users from Agency Director's company
Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Agency Director's company

request.description: Creates a user. Company is automatically set from Agency Director's company (not required in request). Cannot create superadmin or tenant roles. Allowed roles: commercial, technician, accounting, admin, landlord, salesmanager, agency_director. **IMPORTANT: When creating a landlord, the 'properties' array is REQUIRED** - a landlord must have at least one property assigned so they can see data for their properties.

response.name: Success (Landlord with Properties)
response.body:
{
  "ID": 12,
  "Name": "Property Owner",
  "Email": "owner@example.com",
  "Company": "Agency One",
  "Role": "landlord",
  "Status": "Active",
  "CreatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
  "Message": "User created successfully.",
  "properties": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "address": "123 Main St, Apt 4B",
      "type": "Apartment",
      "bedrooms": 2,
      "bathrooms": 1.5,
      "rent": 1500.00,
      "status": "Vacant",
      "landlordId": 12,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "address": "456 Oak Avenue",
      "type": "House",
      "bedrooms": 3,
      "bathrooms": 2.0,
      "rent": 2000.00,
      "status": "Occupied",
      "landlordId": 12,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "propertiesCount": 2
}

response.name: Error - Landlord Without Properties

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Agency Director's company

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Property Owner",
  "email": "owner@example.com",
  "role": "landlord",
  "password": "securepassword123",
  "properties": [
    {
      "address": "123 Main St, Apt 4B",
      "type": "Apartment",
      "bedrooms": 2,
      "bathrooms": 1.5,
      "rent": 1500.00,
      "status": "Vacant"
    },
    {
      "address": "456 Oak Avenue",
      "type": "House",
      "bedrooms": 3,
      "bathrooms": 2.0,
      "rent": 2000.00,
      "status": "Occupied"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Creates a landlord user with properties. **Properties array is REQUIRED** when role is 'landlord'. Each property must have at least 'address' (required). Optional fields: type, bedrooms, bathrooms, rent, status (defaults to 'Vacant' if not provided). The landlord will only see data related to these assigned properties.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "ID": 12,
  "Name": "Property Owner",
  "Email": "owner@example.com",
  "Company": "Agency One",
  "Role": "landlord",
  "Status": "Active",
  "CreatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
  "Message": "User created successfully.",
  "properties": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "address": "123 Main St, Apt 4B",
      "type": "Apartment",
      "bedrooms": 2,
      "bathrooms": 1.5,
      "rent": 1500.00,
      "status": "Vacant",
      "landlordId": 12,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "address": "456 Oak Avenue",
      "type": "House",
      "bedrooms": 3,
      "bathrooms": 2.0,
      "rent": 2000.00,
      "status": "Occupied",
      "landlordId": 12,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "propertiesCount": 2
}

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns only properties from Agency Director's company

request.description: Lists all properties in the agency director's company. Includes properties from: SystemProperty (created by agency director), Property (created by commercial/sales manager), LandlordProperty (created by landlords in the same company), and Listing (commercial listings). Each property includes a 'Source' field indicating its origin.

response.name: Success
response.body:
[
  {
    "ID": 901,
    "Address": "789 Pine Ln",
    "Company": "Agency One",
    "Type": "House",
    "Status": "Occupied",
    "Rent": 2000.0,
    "Tenant": "Jane Smith",
    "Source": "Super Admin"
  },
  {
    "ID": 902,
    "Address": "456 Oak Ave",
    "Company": "Agency One",
    "Type": "Condo",
    "Status": "Vacant",
    "Rent": 1200.0,
    "Tenant": null,
    "Source": "Landlord Dashboard"
  },
  {
    "ID": 903,
    "Address": "123 Main St",
    "Company": "Agency One",
    "Type": "Apartment",
    "Status": "Available",
    "Rent": 1500.0,
    "Tenant": null,
    "Source": "Commercial Dashboard"
  }
]

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Agency Director's company

body.raw:
{
  "address": "789 Pine Ln",
  "type": "Apartment Building",
  "rent": 2000.00,

      "unitNumber": "101",

      "bedrooms": 2,
      "bathrooms": 2.0,
      "status": "Vacant",
      "tenant": null
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Creates a property with optional units/houses. For apartment buildings or properties with multiple units, include the 'units' array. Each unit requires: unitNumber (e.g., '101', 'A1', 'Unit 5'), rent, bedrooms, bathrooms. Optional: status (defaults to 'Vacant'), tenant. Company is automatically set from Agency Director's company (not required in request).

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "id": 901,

Token received from login endpoint - automatically uses Agency Director's company

request.description: Pay for white-label monthly subscription. Company is automatically set from Agency Director's company. Updates company subscription status based on payment status.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - includes both Message and SuperAdminMessage

response.name: Success
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "fromUserId": 1,
    "toUserId": 2,
    "content": "Hello from Super Admin. Welcome to the platform!",
    "read": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "type": "superadmin_message"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "fromUserId": 3,
    "toUserId": 2,
    "content": "Hello, I need assistance with property management.",
    "read": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T09:00:00Z",
    "type": "message"
  }
]

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - includes conversations from both Message and SuperAdminMessage

response.name: Success

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns messages from both Message and SuperAdminMessage tables

request.description: Get conversation with a specific user (ID 1 in this example). Includes both Message and SuperAdminMessage types. Messages from Super Admin will have type 'superadmin_message', others will have type 'message'.

response.name: Success
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "fromUserId": 1,
    "toUserId": 2,
    "content": "Hello, I need assistance.",
    "read": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "type": "superadmin_message"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "fromUserId": 2,
    "toUserId": 1,
    "content": "Sure, how can I help?",
    "read": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:05:00Z",
    "type": "superadmin_message"
  }
]

header.description: Token received from login endpoint. If sending to Super Admin, uses SuperAdminMessage model. Otherwise uses Message model.

request.description: Send a message to any user. If sending to Super Admin (role='superadmin'), the message is stored in SuperAdminMessage table and response includes type='superadmin_message'. For other users, uses Message table and response includes type='message'.

response.name: Success (to Super Admin)
response.body:
{
  "id": 3,
  "fromUserId": 2,
  "toUserId": 1,
  "content": "I can help you with that. Let me check the details.",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:10:00Z",
  "type": "superadmin_message"
}

response.name: Success (to other user)
response.body:
{
  "id": 4,
  "fromUserId": 2,
  "toUserId": 3,
  "content": "I can help you with that. Let me check the details.",
  "read": false,
  "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:10:00Z",
  "type": "message"
}

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - includes messages from both Message and SuperAdminMessage tables

response.name: Success

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns lease agreements with status 'Draft' awaiting signature

response.name: Success

request.description: Get history of transfers sent to owners. All query parameters are optional.
Get internal agency expenses (scope='Internal')

item.name: Get Commissions Per Month Per Building

request.description: List all tenants and their status. Optional status filter.
Get complete tenant profile with payment history, unpaid rent by month, lease agreement, and documents

response.name: Success

request.description: Pay for annual subscription. Company is automatically set from Agency Director's company.

item.name: Commercial
item.description: APIs for commercial manager role - publish property listings, schedule and manage visits, handle visit requests and follow-ups. All data is automatically filtered by company. Commercial managers only see data from their own company.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - automatically filters by Commercial Manager's company
Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Commercial Manager's company

body.raw:
{
  "address": "123 Main St",
  "type": "Apartment",
  "bedrooms": 2,
  "bathrooms": 1.5,
  "price": "$1500/month",
  "description": "Beautiful 2-bedroom apartment in downtown area",
  "status": "Published"
}

request.description: Publish property listing. Company is automatically set from Commercial Manager's company (not required in request). Status can be: Published, Draft, Sold, Rented.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "id": 210,
  "address": "123 Main St",
  "type": "Apartment",
  "bedrooms": 2,
  "bathrooms": 1.5,
  "price": "$1500/month",
  "description": "Beautiful 2-bedroom apartment in downtown area",
  "status": "Published",
  "company": "ABC Real Estate",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
}

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns only listings from Commercial Manager's company

query.description: Filter by status: Published, Draft, Sold, Rented

request.description: List property listings with optional filtering. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company ownership is verified

request.description: Update property listing. Company ownership is verified.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Commercial Manager's company

request.description: Schedule visit with integrated calendar. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD, Time format: HH:MM (24-hour). Company is automatically set from Commercial Manager's company (not required in request).

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "id": 87,
  "property": "123 Main St",
  "client": "Jane Smith",
  "clientEmail": "jane@example.com",
  "clientPhone": "+1234567890",
  "date": "2024-01-20T14:00:00Z",
  "notes": "First-time viewing",
  "status": "Scheduled",
  "company": "ABC Real Estate",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
}

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns visits with status categorization (done/upcoming)

query.description: Filter by status: Scheduled, Completed, Cancelled, No-show
Filter by date range - start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter by date range - end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

request.description: List visits with visit status (done/upcoming). Returns categorized visits: upcoming (future scheduled), done (completed or past), and all. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

response.name: Success

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company ownership is verified

request.description: Update visit status (done/upcoming). Status can be: Scheduled, Completed, Cancelled, No-show. Company ownership is verified.

response.name: Success

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns history of interested clients
Token received from login endpoint - returns only visit requests from Commercial Manager's company

query.description: Filter by status: Pending, Approved, Rejected, Scheduled

request.description: List visit requests with optional status filtering. Company is automatically filtered from token.

request.description: Update visit request status. Status can be: Pending, Approved, Rejected, Scheduled. Company ownership is verified.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - follow-up count and last follow-up date are automatically tracked

request.description: Send follow-up for visit request. Follow-up count and last follow-up date are automatically tracked.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "message": "Follow-up sent",
  "visitRequestId": 33,
  "followUpCount": 1,
  "lastFollowUpAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "followUpMessage": "Please let us know your preferred visit time."
}

item.name: Technician
item.description: APIs for technician role - move-in/move-out inspections, maintenance requests, quotes, and repair progress tracking. All data is automatically filtered by company. Technicians only see data from their own company.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - automatically filters by Technician's company
Token received from login endpoint - returns only inspections from Technician's company

response.name: Success
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 11,
    "property": "B-202",
    "type": "Move-in",
    "inspector": "John Technician",
    "date": "2024-01-18T10:00:00Z",
    "notes": "All appliances in good condition. Minor scratches on refrigerator door.",
    "photos": "[\"/uploads/inspections/1705319400_photo1.jpg\", \"/uploads/inspections/1705319401_photo2.jpg\"]",
    "company": "ABC Real Estate",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-18T10:00:00Z"
  }
]

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Technician's company

body.raw:
{
  "property": "A-101",
  "type": "Move-in",
  "inspector": "John Technician",
  "notes": "All appliances in good condition. Minor scratches on refrigerator door.",
  "photos": ["/uploads/inspections/photo1.jpg", "/uploads/inspections/photo2.jpg"]
}

request.description: Create move-in or move-out inspection with digital form (photos + notes). Company is automatically set from Technician's company (not required in request). Type must be 'Move-in' or 'Move-out'.

query.description: Filter by status: Pending, In Progress, Completed

item.name: Accounting
item.description: APIs for accounting manager role - payments, expenses, collections, and financial management. All data is automatically filtered by company. Accounting managers only see data from their own company.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - automatically filters by Accounting Manager's company
Token received from login endpoint - returns only payments from Accounting Manager's company

query.description: Filter by Payment status: Pending, Approved
Filter by Charge type: Rent, Deposit

request.description: List tenant payments with optional filtering. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company

request.description: Record rent or deposit payment. Company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company (not required in request).

header.description: Token received from login endpoint
Token received from login endpoint

Token received from login endpoint
Token received from login endpoint - returns only payments from Accounting Manager's company

request.description: List landlord payments (net after commission) with optional filtering. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company

request.description: Record landlord payment (net after commission). Company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company (not required in request).

header.description: Token received from login endpoint
Token received from login endpoint - returns only collections from Accounting Manager's company

query.description: Filter by Charge type: Rent, Deposit

request.description: List collections with optional filtering. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - real-time tracking of collections per building
Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company

request.description: Record collection. Company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company (not required in request).

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns only expenses from Accounting Manager's company

request.description: List building expenses with optional filtering. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company

request.description: Add building expense. Company is automatically set from Accounting Manager's company (not required in request). Date format: YYYY-MM-DD

item.name: Admin
item.description: APIs for administrative agent role - document verification and approval, automatic lease contract generation, utility company document tracking, and pending payment follow-ups. All data is automatically filtered by company. Admins only see data from their own company.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - automatically filters by Admin's company
Token received from login endpoint
Token received from login endpoint - returns only documents from Admin's company

query.description: Filter by status: Pending, Approved, Rejected

request.description: List documents with optional filtering. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - approval timestamp and approver are automatically tracked
Token received from login endpoint - rejection timestamp and reason are automatically tracked

request.description: Reject document with optional reason. Rejection timestamp and reason are automatically tracked.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint

request.description: Send follow-up for missing files. Follow-up count and last follow-up date are automatically tracked.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "message": "Follow-up sent",
  "documentId": 1,
  "followUpCount": 1,
  "lastFollowUpAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "followUpMessage": "Please submit the missing document as soon as possible."
}

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - creates utility tracking record

request.description: Send document to utility company. Creates a utility tracking record. Type can be: Water, Electricity, Gas, etc.

}

query.description: Filter by status: Pending, Sent, Confirmed

request.description: List utility company document tracking records. All filters are optional. Company is automatically filtered from token.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint

request.description: Update utility status (e.g., mark as Confirmed when utility company confirms receipt). Status can be: Sent, Confirmed.

request.description: Create lease contract. If autoGenerate is true, lease document is automatically generated. Company is automatically set from Admin's company (not required in request).

header.description: Token received from login endpoint

formdata.description: Excel file (.xlsx or .xls) with tenant details. Required columns: Name, Property, Email, Phone, Amount, MoveInDate. Optional: Status (defaults to 'Active'). Date format: YYYY-MM-DD or DD/MM/YYYY

request.description: Upload an Excel file (.xlsx or .xls) to import multiple tenants/clients at once. The file must have a header row with columns: Name, Property, Email, Phone, Amount, MoveInDate, Status (optional). Each row after the header represents one tenant. The Status column is optional and defaults to 'Active' if not provided. Date format can be YYYY-MM-DD or DD/MM/YYYY. Duplicate emails within the same company will be skipped.

item.name: Landlord
item.description: APIs for landlord role - view owned buildings/properties, track rents, view net payments after commission, review expenses, and download reports. All data is automatically filtered by landlord ID and company. Landlords only see data from their own properties.

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - automatically filters by Landlord's ID and company

response.name: Success
response.description: Returns overview metrics for the landlord. **Note:** totalPropertiesUnderManagement now correctly counts all properties assigned to the landlord (created by agency director or added by landlord).

header.description: Token received from login endpoint - returns only properties owned by the Landlord
Token received from login endpoint - landlordId is automatically set from token (not required in request)

body.raw:
{
  "address": "456 Oak Ave",
  "type": "Apartment Building",
  "bedrooms": 2,
  "bathrooms": 1.5,
  "rent": 1200.00,
  "units": [
    {
      "unitNumber": "Unit 1",
      "rent": 1000.00,
      "bedrooms": 1,
      "bathrooms": 1.0,
      "status": "Vacant",
      "tenant": null
    },
    {
      "unitNumber": "Unit 2",
      "rent": 1200.00,
      "bedrooms": 2,
      "bathrooms": 1.5,
      "status": "Occupied",
      "tenant": "Jane Smith"
    },
    {
      "unitNumber": "Unit 3",
      "rent": 1100.00,
      "bedrooms": 1,
      "bathrooms": 1.0,
      "status": "Vacant",
      "tenant": null
    }
  ]
}
body.description: Add a property with optional units/houses. For apartment buildings or properties with multiple units, include the 'units' array. Each unit requires: unitNumber (e.g., '101', 'A1', 'Unit 5'), rent, bedrooms, bathrooms. Optional: status (defaults to 'Vacant'), tenant. landlordId is automatically set from token (not required in request). **Note:** Properties added by landlords are also visible to Agency Directors in their property list.

request.description: View net payments after commission deduction. All filters are optional. Shows netAmount and commission for each payment.

request.description: Get payment and payout history. Shows both rent payments (collected) and payouts (net after commission). All filters are optional.

response.name: Success

request.description: Review expenses grouped by property. All filters are optional. Returns expenses with totals per property.

response.name: Success

header.description: Token received from login endpoint

query.description: Report type: financial, properties, expenses (default: comprehensive)

request.description: Download comprehensive report as JSON file. Report types: 'financial' (payments, payouts, expenses), 'properties' (properties with occupant counts), 'expenses' (expenses only), or default (comprehensive).
